DOC.brief_summary: Comparison the use of marcaine and chloroprocaine in rachianesthesia for a surgical correction of inguinal hernia. Comparision between acute and chronic (3 months and 6 months) pain.
DOC.brief_title: Comparision of the Use in Marcaine and Chloroprocaine in Rachianesthesia for the Surgical Correction of Inguinal Hernia.
DOC.criteria: Adults under rachianesthesia Personal history of gastric ulcus ASA 4 Emergency Combined surgery
